英文: CB
BODY LENGTH AT BACK: MEASURE FROM HPS TO FINISHED HEM EDGE AT CB.
BODY LENGTH AT BACK: MEASURE FROM CB NECK SEAM TO FINISHED HEM EDGE AT CB.
BODY LENGTH AT FRONT
BODY LENGTH AT FRONT: MEASURE FROM BOUND NECK TO FINISHED HEM EDGE AT CF.
中文: 前中身長-肩高點領滾邊量

英文: BODY LENGTH AT SIDE SEAM: MEASURE FROM BOUND NECK TO FINISHED SIDE SEAM HEM EDGE.
中文: 身長-肩高點領滾邊脇邊量

英文: HEM DROP FROM CF: MEASURE FROM CF HEM TO SIDE HEM.
中文: 下襬垂高-脇邊到前中水平

英文: CHEST WIDTH (1/2 MEASURE): MEASURE FROM SIDE TO SIDE AT 1” BELOW ARMHOLE.
CF ZIPPER LENGTH (PARTIAL): MEASURE FROM TOP STOPPER TO BOTTOM OF OPENING.
CF INTERIOR ZIPPER LENGTH: MEASURE FROM TOP TO BOTTOM OF ZIPPER.

英文: SIDE SEA
WAIST PLACEMENT FROM HPS: MEASURE FROM BOUND NECK TO WAIST.
中文: 腰圍位置-肩高點領滾邊下量

英文: WAIST DRAWCORD TOTAL LENGTH: MEASURE TOTAL LENGTH END TO END, INCLUDING LOOP.
BOTTOM WIDTH EXTENDED - FLAT - MEASURE BODY PANEL EXTENDED

英文: HEM WIDTH RELAXED (RIB/ELASTIC 1/2 MEASURE): MEASURE ALONG BOTTOM EDGE WITH RIB/ELASTIC RELAXED.
HEM WIDTH EXTENDED (RIB/ELASTIC 1/2 MEASURE): MEASURE ALONG BOTTOM SEAM WITH RIB/ELASTIC EXTENDED.
HIP WIDTH PLACEMENT FROM HPS: MEASURE FROM HPS TO HIP.
HIP WIDTH PLACEMENT FROM CB: MEASURE FROM CB BOUND NECK TO HIP.
中文: 臀圍位置-後中領滾邊下

英文: ACROSS SHOULDER FOR VESTS (OR SHOULDER WIDTH): MEASURE FROM LPS TO LPS.
ACROSS CHEST/BACK PLACEMENT: MEASURE DOWN FROM HPS.
中文: 前胸/後背寬位置-肩高點下量

英文: ACROSS CHEST PLACEMENT: MEASURE DOWN FROM BOUND NECK.
中文: 前胸寬位置-肩高點領滾邊下量

英文: ACROSS CHEST: MEASURE FROM ARMHOLE SEAM TO ARMHOLE SEAM ACROSS FRONT.
ACROSS BACK: MEASURE FROM ARMHOLE SEAM TO ARMHOLE SEAM ACROSS BACK.
BACK YOKE
ACROSS CHEST (RAGLAN): MEASURE FROM ARMHOLE TO ARMHOLE ACROSS FRONT.
SHOULDER SLOPE: MEASURE THE VERTICAL DISTANCE BETWEEN HPS AND LPS.
中文: 肩斜-肩高點水平線到肩點量

英文: FRONT SHOULDER PIECING WIDTH AT NECK SEAM: MEASURE FROM HPS TO FORWARD SHOULDER SEAM ALONG NECK SEAM (OUTERWEAR).

英文: BACK SHOULDER PIECING WIDTH AT ARMHOLE: MEASURE FROM LPS TO BACK SHOULDER SEAM ALONG ARMHOLE SEAM (OUTERWEAR).
中文: 肩剪接片後傾-肩點處沿肩縫彎量

英文: RAGLAN SHOULDER SLOPE PLACEMENT FROM CB: MEASURE HORIZONTALLY OUT FROM CB AT HPS LEVEL.
中文: 拉克蘭肩斜位置-肩高點水平線距後中量

英文: RAGLAN SHOULDER SLOPE: MEASURE VERTICAL DISTANCE FROM BOUND NECK TO EDGE OF GARMENT AT RAGLAN SHOULDER SLOPE PLACEMENT.
中文: 拉克蘭肩斜-肩高點領滾邊水平線下量

英文: FORWARD SHOULDER
FORWARD SHOULDER: MEASURE STRAIGHT FROM NATURAL SHOULDER TO FORWARD SHOULDER SEAM, PERPENDICULAR FROM SHOULDER.
中文: 肩前傾-距自然肩線直量

英文: BACK SHOULDER AT LPS: MEASURE STRAIGHT FROM LPS TO BACK SHOULDER SEAM, PERPENDICULAR FROM SHOULDER.
中文: 肩後傾-肩點處沿肩縫直量

英文: BACK RAGLAN AT HPS: MEASURE ALONG THE NECK SEAM FROM HPS TO BACK RAGLAN SEAM.
中文: 後拉克蘭位置- 肩高點沿後領縫量

英文: ARMHOLE
FRONT ARMHOLE
BACK ARMHOLE: MEASURE FROM FORWARD SHOULDER SEAM TO SIDE SEAM (ALONG CURVE).

英文: BACK RAGLAN ARMHOLE
ARMHOLE DROP (SLEEVELESS): MEASURE IN A STRAIGHT VERTICAL LINE FROM LPS TO BOTTOM OF ARMHOLE, EDGE TO EDGE.

FRONT NECK DROP
BACK NECK DROP

英文: COLLAR LENGTH AT TOP EDGE (FOR ZIP-THROUGH STYLES): MEASURE FROM CF TO CF ALONG TOP OF COLLAR (INCLUDING ZIPPER TEETH).
COLLAR HEIGHT AT CB: MEASURE FROM CB NECK SEAM TO TOP COLLAR EDGE.

英文: NON-FLAT KNIT COLLAR OUTSIDE EDGE LENGTH: MEASURE FROM COLLAR POINT TO COLLAR POINT.

BUST DART LENGTH: MEASURE FROM SIDE SEAM TO END OF DART.
LAPEL NOTCH: MEASURE FROM INSIDE CORNER TO LAPEL POINT.
SLEEVE
3/4 SLEEVE LENGTH FROM CB (RAGLAN): MEASURE FROM CB NECK SEAM (SET IN) TO FINISHED SLEEVE HEM (2 PT).
